text:
Hey Micaela, 

How are you? I hope things are going well for you these days. Just thought I'd say hello since it's been a little while. 

A project I worked on over a year ago while at Milk VFX is finally getting released soon. It was a lower budget one, but I'm still excited for it. Michael Caine is the voice of the sandman character, and I had a lot of fun animating to his vocal performance. None of my shots are in the trailer, but just figured it might be fun to share:

<https://youtu.be/gH2qKK52E3k|https://youtu.be/gH2qKK52E3k>
